channel.title: mark on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in mark on Barefoot Rob

item.title: met Mark on the way to workshop today
item.description: Mark synchronistically got on the same train car as me and we had a great quick check-in. I was able to dump everything about work and computer things going unexpectedly, and he told me about a cool set of questions he found that may work well in our men’s circle. We did not have long to hang out so just quick stories and then long wave bye as we had to go on separate trains in 代々木上原 station.

item.title: Working with Mark soon: Behavioral OS
item.description: 21:58 Tuesday 07 May 2019 JST I found out that Mark is a trainer for Behavioral OS, something I have been interested in for a while. They are launching a course this year and I am excited to join!

item.title: Great hanging out with Mark
item.description: 06:11 Monday 12 November 2018 JST Mark rode 4km from the 古民家公園 to our house yesterday to meet Lin and see Marble Track 3 in person. He had some great ideas for MT3: Encourage teambuilding among youth by giving them a certain set of track pieces, tools, and time limit to make a track that fits a certain set of requirements. Set my camera so the whole set is in focus.

item.title: hiking day
item.description: 21:37 Sunday 19 April 2015 JST Great fun barefoot hiking today around Mt Mitake! Rohini joined the barefoot lifestyle and we clambored up some rocks, including up the back side! At the top, oops! I stubbed my toe.
